title: I wish Caitlyn had a smoother attack animation.
body: Every time I auto attack with her, it feels like i'm goddamn casting a spell every second.

replies.body: It has a long windup, which means you move midway and cancel your autos. Thankfully it's less painful with higher attack speed.
Her auto attack animation does feel quite clunky and is very easy to cancel your autos
If you played Anivia or Karthus you might come to appreciate it.
Galio seems alright with me tho.
